title: Gamification-Based Local Language Preservation Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners possess awareness of regional language preservation importance and guaranteed access to mobile-based gamification learning tools

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend basic vocabulary and everyday expressions in the local language with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners maintain continuous engagement by completing weekly quiz missions through a gamification platform at a rate of over 90%.
Learners can explain cultural wisdom embedded in regional languages through case analysis and apply it to modern life.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
